localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (💰, 🚗, 🏠,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!
blogPost.body: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (💰, 🚗, 🏠,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!
blogPost.title: Worth it - Keeping track of your money, the simple way
blogPost.author: Maxime Mazzone

localize.description: 如果一想到钱就头疼，那你就来对地方了。Worth it在这里让它变得尽可能简单，只需列出你的资产余额（💰，🚗，🏠，.），并按自己的节奏更新。今天就下载iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追踪你的钱，简单的方法

localize.description: 如果一想到錢就頭疼，那你就來對地方了。Worth it在這裏讓它變得儘可能簡單，只需列出你的資產餘額（💰，🚗，🏠，.），並按自己的節奏更新。今天就下載iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的錢，簡單的方法

previous.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
previous.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用

next.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
next.title: Ponder - Daily journal from your new tab

localize.description: Ponder引导你在新的标签页上完成每日日记。有了自我反思的提示、快速键盘快捷键、美学背景和私人存储的条目，你只需专注于写作--Ponder 会处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 从您的新标签页的每日日记

localize.description: Ponder引導你在新的標籤頁上完成每日日記。有了自我反思的提示、快速鍵盤快捷鍵、美學背景和私人存儲的條目，你只需專注於寫作--Ponder 會處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 從您的新標籤頁的每日日記
